disease_desc: A fungal infection is an inflammatory condition caused by a fungus.
recommendation_for_disease: Maintain good hygiene, avoid damp environments, and use antifungal medication as prescribed by a healthcare provider.

disease_desc: Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) is a long-term condition where stomach contents come back up into the esophagus resulting in either symptoms or complications.
recommendation_for_disease: Avoid large meals, reduce intake of fatty foods, and elevate the head while sleeping.

disease_desc: Chronic cholestasis is a condition where bile cannot flow from the liver to the duodenum.
recommendation_for_disease: Follow a low-fat diet, avoid alcohol, and take medications to manage bile acid levels.

disease_desc: A drug reaction is an adverse effect resulting from a medication.
recommendation_for_disease: Discontinue the suspected medication and consult a healthcare provider for an alternative treatment.

disease_desc: Peptic ulcer disease involves sores that develop on the inside lining of your stomach and the upper portion of your small intestine.
recommendation_for_disease: Avoid spicy foods, reduce NSAID use, and take prescribed proton pump inhibitors.

disease_desc: Acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS) is a chronic, potentially life-threatening condition caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
recommendation_for_disease: Adhere to antiretroviral therapy, maintain a healthy lifestyle, and avoid exposure to infections.

disease_desc: Gastroenteritis is an intestinal infection marked by diarrhea, cramps, nausea, vomiting, and fever.
recommendation_for_disease: Stay hydrated, consume electrolyte solutions, and rest.

disease_desc: Bronchial asthma is a condition where the airways narrow and swell and may produce extra mucus.
recommendation_for_disease: Use prescribed inhalers, avoid triggers, and follow an asthma action plan.

disease_desc: Hypertension is a condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.
recommendation_for_disease: Monitor blood pressure regularly, reduce salt intake, and take prescribed medications.

disease_desc: A migraine is a headache of varying intensity, often accompanied by nausea and sensitivity to light and sound.
recommendation_for_disease: Avoid known triggers, maintain a regular sleep schedule, and use prescribed medications.

disease_desc: Cervical spondylosis is age-related wear and tear affecting the spinal disks in your neck.
recommendation_for_disease: Perform neck exercises, use a supportive pillow, and consider physical therapy.

disease_desc: Paralysis due to brain hemorrhage is the loss of muscle function in part of your body.
recommendation_for_disease: Seek immediate medical attention, follow rehabilitation programs, and consider physical therapy.

disease_desc: Jaundice is a condition in which the skin, whites of the eyes, and mucous membranes turn yellow due to high bilirubin levels.
recommendation_for_disease: Identify and treat the underlying cause, ensure proper hydration, and consider phototherapy if advised.

disease_desc: Malaria is a serious disease transmitted by mosquitoes, causing fever, chills, and flu-like illness.
recommendation_for_disease: Take antimalarial drugs as prescribed, use mosquito nets, and apply insect repellent.

disease_desc: Chickenpox is a highly contagious viral infection causing an itchy, blister-like rash.
recommendation_for_disease: Stay hydrated, use calamine lotion for itching, and avoid scratching to prevent infection.

disease_desc: Dengue is a mosquito-borne viral infection causing flu-like symptoms.
recommendation_for_disease: Rest, stay hydrated, and take acetaminophen to relieve pain and reduce fever.

disease_desc: Typhoid fever is a bacterial infection that can spread throughout the body affecting many organs.
recommendation_for_disease: Take prescribed antibiotics, ensure good sanitation, and consume only safe drinking water.

disease_desc: Hepatitis A is a viral liver disease that can cause mild to severe illness.
recommendation_for_disease: Get vaccinated, practice good hygiene, and avoid contaminated food and water.

disease_desc: Hepatitis B is a serious liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus.
recommendation_for_disease: Get vaccinated, avoid sharing needles, and practice safe sex.

disease_desc: Hepatitis C is a viral infection that causes liver inflammation, sometimes leading to serious liver damage.
recommendation_for_disease: Avoid sharing needles, get regular medical check-ups, and take antiviral medications as prescribed.

disease_desc: Hepatitis D is a liver infection caused by the hepatitis D virus and occurs only in those infected with hepatitis B.
recommendation_for_disease: Get vaccinated for hepatitis B, avoid sharing needles, and practice safe sex.

disease_desc: Hepatitis E is a liver disease caused by the hepatitis E virus.
recommendation_for_disease: Ensure good sanitation, avoid contaminated food and water, and get vaccinated if available.

disease_desc: Alcoholic hepatitis is inflammation of the liver caused by drinking alcohol.
recommendation_for_disease: Stop drinking alcohol, follow a nutritious diet, and seek medical treatment.

disease_desc: Tuberculosis (TB) is an infectious disease usually caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis bacteria.
recommendation_for_disease: Take the full course of prescribed antibiotics, practice good hygiene, and avoid close contact with others.

disease_desc: The common cold is a viral infection of the nose and throat.
recommendation_for_disease: Rest, stay hydrated, and use over-the-counter cold medications to relieve symptoms.

disease_desc: Pneumonia is an infection that inflames the air sacs in one or both lungs.
recommendation_for_disease: Take prescribed antibiotics, rest, and stay hydrated.

disease_desc: Hemorrhoids are swollen veins in the lower part of the anus and rectum.
recommendation_for_disease: Consume a high-fiber diet, stay hydrated, and use topical treatments to reduce symptoms.

disease_desc: A heart attack occurs when the flow of blood to the heart is blocked.
recommendation_for_disease: Seek immediate medical attention, take prescribed medications, and follow a heart-healthy lifestyle.

disease_desc: Varicose veins are swollen, twisted veins that lie just under the skin.
recommendation_for_disease: Avoid standing for long periods, elevate your legs, and wear compression stockings.

disease_desc: Hypothyroidism is a condition in which the thyroid gland doesn't produce enough thyroid hormone.
recommendation_for_disease: Take prescribed thyroid hormone replacement medication, eat a balanced diet, and get regular blood tests.

disease_desc: Hyperthyroidism is a condition in which the thyroid gland produces too much thyroid hormone.
recommendation_for_disease: Take prescribed antithyroid medications, avoid iodine-rich foods, and consider radioactive iodine therapy if recommended.

disease_desc: Hypoglycemia is a condition caused by low blood glucose levels.
recommendation_for_disease: Eat small, frequent meals, monitor blood sugar levels regularly, and carry glucose tablets.

disease_desc: Osteoarthritis is a degenerative joint disease causing pain and stiffness.
recommendation_for_disease: Exercise regularly, maintain a healthy weight, and take pain relievers as prescribed.

disease_desc: Arthritis is inflammation of one or more joints causing pain and stiffness.
recommendation_for_disease: Take anti-inflammatory medications, perform low-impact exercises, and use hot or cold therapy.

disease_desc: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) causes brief episodes of mild to intense dizziness.
recommendation_for_disease: Perform the Epley maneuver, avoid sudden head movements, and seek vestibular rehabilitation therapy.

disease_desc: Acne is a skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells.
recommendation_for_disease: Use topical treatments, avoid picking or squeezing pimples, and maintain a regular skincare routine.

disease_desc: A urinary tract infection (UTI) is an infection in any part of the urinary system.
recommendation_for_disease: Drink plenty of water, take prescribed antibiotics, and practice good personal hygiene.

disease_desc: Psoriasis is a skin disease that causes red, itchy scaly patches.
recommendation_for_disease: Use topical treatments, keep the skin moisturized, and consider phototherapy if recommended.

disease_desc: Impetigo is a highly contagious skin infection causing red sores.
recommendation_for_disease: Keep the affected area clean, apply prescribed antibiotic ointment, and avoid close contact with others.
